name: Escape Dragua
description:
In Escape Dragua you are trapped in a forest and must escape before being captured. Escape Dragua is a single player game built using Unity and free Unity Assets, free music from Freesound.org, and following GameDevUnlocked.com's Story Driven Game course material (with some minor tweaks of my own).  Hope you enjoy this simple game.

Game Play Controls:

WASD to move player

SHIFT to Sprint

SPACEBAR to Jump

LEFT CLICK to perform interaction

ALT + F4 to exit game

Game automatically Restarts if you are captured.

Game automatically closes after completion (after ending title screen).

Credits

Paid Assets: Playmaker

Free Unity Assets: Humans - Watchtower, Sci-Fi_Door, V-Light Volumetrict Lights, ATM, Realistic Skeleton and Bones, Bronze Bear Statue, Baker's House, Village Houses Pack, Medieval Stone Keep, Terrain Sample Asset Pack, 8K Skybox Pack Free, and Footstep (Snow and Grass).

Sounds/Audio:

Voice overs and Sound editing in Game by Fuemanshu.  All else done by original creators below.

I am A Man Who Will Fight for Your Honor - Chris Zabriskie

Elevator Door Opening - Nathan Lomel

Horn Warning Us - sbarncar

Human has been Nutralised - cityrocker

Robot Rumbling - michalwa2003

Wind-down 1 - timgormly

Wind Rustling Trees - FunWithSound

Wind Morning - Ambientsoundapp

This game is free to play and cannot be reproduced for commercial/non-commercials purposes.  All assets, music, and sounds belong to their original creators.  If you are interested in the music/sounds please contact the creators via the links provided or find them on the Unity Asset Store.

Thanks for your time and have a great rest of your day!
